abstract: Already growing in Britain, the American digital video distributor will face entrenched local competitors on the Continent — not to mention Amazon.
snippet: Already growing in Britain, the American digital video distributor will face entrenched local competitors on the Continent — not to mention Amazon.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — Netflix, whose digital distribution of movies and TV shows has made it a media force in the United States, now has wide eyes for Europe.

headline.main: Netflix Faces Hurdles, Country by Country, in Bid to Expand in Europe
headline.print_headline: Netflix FacesHurdles, Country by Country, in Bid to Expand in Europe
